channel.title: Script run off website?
channel.description:
How would i say 'Run a script off a website that would activate a batch file on my computor'? I need this so i can get an efficient enough server restarter,
I googled this but the results were not what i expected them to be, So i decide to ask you guys.

item.title: Script run off website?
item.dc:creator: @xstrxpurez xstrxpurez
item.description:
@xstrxpurez wrote:

Jordiescape:

Marc you’d need to tell me how to add SQL to my server as this is for what we’re making together <3.

lol… go google it and then read up on mySQL databasing and scripts.

[quote=“si force, post:10, topic:238502”][quote author=xstrxpurez link=topic=314768.msg2503020#msg2503020 date=1224793134]

How would i say ‘Run a script off a website that would activate a batch file on my computor’?
I need this so i can get an efficient enough server restarter,

I googled this but the results were not what i expected them to be,
So i decide to ask you guys.

um lets see i am a lil rusty on this but…

maybe try adding mySQL to forums and server… but eh… im tryin to think about the script.

Ok, I’ll add MySQL while you Try remember the script

Don’t go to much trouble though.

ok you wanting the server to be started by ur website to activate the batch file… well umm

try adding the script on to ur forums using the mySQL then set up a link to the batch file… or so the batch file checks the ‘link’ for the website and set a timer up threw it… i am trying to get on the right path but eh idk… that sounds around the right spot.

Your basically saying 'Set up a path root from MySQL to my computor,
Which will RESTART my Server and set the timer for every Half an hour or so?

yea… but when running the script you will need the script link in ur batch file… or possibly make it a .exe to get it to work a lil better
[/quote]

Ah, Ok thanks xstrxpurez, I’ll do that so.[/quote]

your welcome and hopefully it works.

Read full topic
